column3: What tool have you used to see the warnings?
@MarcoFalke macOS clang (g++)\n\nTo clarify, these warnings show up when compiling bitcoin. It's not some obscure linter somewhere.

Running `make &> make_output_...` on master versus on this PR:
```
$ wc make_output_*
    1464    5925   90357 make_output_master
     613    1469   28370 make_output_signfixed
```
More than halves the output lines from compiling.
Tested ACK c55aa4f27d4fcb1d179fb1b17034476a5918ea85\n(fixed my new boost::test warnings on macOS 10.12)
nit: I think `CAmount{60000000000}` works as well
